sources.name: WHO – (Share of stunted children under 5)
sources.description:
Data published by World Health Organization
Data publisher's source The data is based on information from the Nutrition Landscape Information System (NLiS), a system which combines information from a great number of sources (http://www.who.int/nutrition/nlis/en/).
Linkhttp://apps.who.int/gho/data/view.main.90200
Retrieved26 February 2016

Additional information

Some of the WHO estimates refer to a range of years (e.g. 2003-2004) in uploading this data we had to change this to the last year that the original range referred to.
